name: Horror Case
description:
Dare to get into the old house and be a part of a horror case solver ?

The place is haunted, you are challenged to reveal the mystery. Place by place you'll be brought to investigate the house until you find the darkest secret that happened in the past. Don't run! Look around the room, feel its spooky atmosphere, then tap specific objects inside the room to spell the mystery words. Slow but sure, you will arrive at the final stage where the biggest secret is hidden.

Always be aware of your surrounding as something mysterious always watches you there!

Features:
• Free, fun yet thrilling to play!
• Easy rules, spell the correct mystery words to win the game.
• No time limit, set your own pace to reveal the darkest secret of the house.
• Get the hints easily to help you win the game.
• A word game not only for a horror fans!

Disclaimer: This game may contain disturbing materials.

Share your thoughts and let us know your horror experience via info@alegrium.com
